form.name: test_not_possible
form.page_subtitle: CWC Diagnostic: Fever> Test not Possible

field.name: Does the child have any of the following conditions?
Severe febrile disease, malaria status unknown
field.options: Any danger sign OR | Stiff neck OR - Signs of Severe Malaria: | Persistent vomiting | Convulsions | Lethargy / unconsciousness | Dark, cola-coloured urine |Persistent fever ≥ 38.5ºC | Unable to sit or stand | Jaundice | Severe pallor | Shock | Bleeding | Click here to take action

field.name: Uncomplicated malaria
field.options: Presence or history of fever (by history, feels hot, or temperature ≥ 38.5°C) AND | Malaria status unknown | Click here to take action

field.name: Severe complicated measles
field.options: Malaria status unknown PLUS: | Any general danger sign OR | Clouding of cornea OR | Deep or extensive mouth ulcers | Click here to take action

field.name: Measles with eye or mouth complications
field.options: Malaria status unknown PLUS: |Pus draining from eye OR | Mouth ulcers | Click here to take action

field.name: Uncomplicated Measles
field.options: Malaria status Unknown PLUS: | Measles now OR | Measles within last 3 months | Click here to take action
